snippet: LEVINE--Noel. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Noel Levine, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Noel Levine, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
